snippet: Marco Belinelli made a game-winning jumper with 3.1 seconds left and the Chicago Bulls extended their road win streak to 14.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Phoenix Suns and coach Alvin Gentry agree to part ways, ending five-year run of one of the franchise's most popular coaches; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marco Belinelli made a game-winning jumper with 3.1 seconds left and the Chicago Bulls extended their road win streak to 14.

headline.seo: Bulls Edge Celtics in Final Seconds of Overtime
headline.main: Bulls Edge Celtics in Final Seconds of Overtime
headline.print_headline: Gentry Out As Coach Of the Suns
